alert.note: Alert for Misty Fjords (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:03PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SALMON RIVER ON THE RISE... A glacier dammed lake outburst has started on the Salmon river near Hyder as the Summit Lake has begun to drain. The water levels on the Salmon River continues to rise and should crest Wednesday or Thursday. Inherent uncertainty in these events result in varying crest height and timing issues. The area most at risk for impact is near mile marker 9 on the road along the Salmon River. Be aware of debris in the water. Very cold water will increase the threat of hypothermia. Please report any observed impacts to the National Weather Service in one of the following ways: From the website inws.ncep.noaa.gov/report, via social media by sending National Weather Service Juneau a message on Facebook or tweeting us @NWSJuneau, or email us at juneau.weather@noaa.gov.
